title: Gulf Oil
content:
Hey Everyone,

I'm wondering if anyone can solve this one. Hand drawn maybe?

Thanks in advance!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414234133im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Gulf_logo_5631.svg.png)
author: systm22

comments.content:
Most likely custom, but you could mimic the look by starting with something like URW Grotesk Wide Bold:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/grotesk/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414234133/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/grotesk/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/grotesk/")

I can't find a exact match - probably customized or hand drawn as you said.  
If you are looking for a base font to customize, you may like **[Delargo DT (Bold)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414234133/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=DTPTypes%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=Delargo%20DT%20Pro%20-%20Bold&fid=68c2676687c2eb89694f072b1dc170c0&fsize=60&text=Gulf&fit=1)**
